We are:

Professional Process Serving for Attorneys

Our Services Contact Us

Who we are:

At Prater Processing Services, we specialize in delivering dependable and expert process serving solutions tailored specifically for attorneys. Our commitment to excellence ensures that legal documents are served promptly, accurately, and with the utmost professionalism. We understand the critical importance of efficient process serving in the legal process, that's why we are dedicated and equipped with the expertise to handle even the most complex serving requirements, ensuring that legal proceedings proceed smoothly and effectively. Trust us to deliver reliable service that meets your exacting standards, supporting your legal practice with efficiency and precision. Discover how our comprehensive process serving solutions can streamline your legal operations and provide peace of mind throughout the entire process. Our services include:

  • Serving court orders
  • Document retrieval
  • Skip tracing
  • And more!

Our Process

Ensuring your documents are served accurately and efficiently.

1

Receive Documents

We receive the documents you need served.

2

Locate Recipient

Using our expertise to locate the recipient.

3

Serve Documents

Serving documents professionally and promptly.

4

Confirmation

Providing proof of service and confirmation.
